DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate dark chocolate rich polyphenols decrease body weight/ body fat overweight obese adult population .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Polyphenol-rich Dark Chocolate Body Weight Overweight Obese Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Polyphenols phytochemical widely available plant , may several favourable effect health . Dark chocolate ( DC ) one high source polyphenols food . Animal vitro study demonstrate cocoa dark chocolate may exert anti-obesity effect mainly due polyphenol effect glucose fatty acid metabolism . Human study show regular chocolate eater low body weight compare non regular eater , DC promote satiety reduces craving . The aim pilot study investigate effect polyphenol-rich DC body weight overweight obese adult population , incorporate non-restricted diet . Twenty-eight apparently healthy volunteer recruit . Participants randomly receive 20g daily one two different type DC : Placebo DC ( low polyphenols ) DC rich polyphenols ( 500mg ) period twelve week . Participants ask make three appointment one follow-up appointment university clinical lab . Anthropometric measurement ( height , weight , waist circumference , body fat percentage ) take visit . Compliance define intake 85 % chocolate weekly , tested measure total polyphenols 24-hour urine sample , end intervention . To monitor fluctuation participant ' diet physical activity study period , three-day diet diary , Food Frequency questionnaire assessment polyphenol intake physical activity questionnaire collect start study every four week . A follow-up appointment ( four week end intervention ) check difference anthropometric measure maintain . Data analyse ANCOVA time ( pre- post- ) treatment ( DC placebo ) between-subject factor . This study novel finding basis future large trial .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult BMI 2535 Males Females Age : 1865 year Participants cardiovascular disease , hypertension diabetes Participants take medication affect insulin , cholesterol , triglycerides Blood pressure Participants recently participate currently weight management program Participants regular consumption cocoa DC ( > 1 serving/week )
